response.original_title: Saving Places: Preserving Indiana's Architectural Heritage
response.overview: Saving Places: Preserving Indiana's Architectural Heritage tells the stories of individuals engaged in revitalizing, protecting, and preserving our historic places in Indiana. Indiana University professor of History James H. Madison gives a tour of four Indiana historic landmarks: Wilson Bridge, John Jay Center for Learning, Maple Grove Road and Lyles Station School.
response.title: Saving Places: Preserving Indiana's Architectural Heritage
